long_description: The lightweight REI Rainwall rain pants offer the full-featured, waterproof breathable protection that an active kid needs. He can keep them in his pack for sudden changes in the weather. Lightweight 2.5-layer ripstop nylon is waterproof, breathable and windproof to 60 mph; seams are sealed for complete protection. Elastic waistband and flat cordlock hem adjustment personalize the fit. Articulated knees allow comfortable range of motion without tugging. Zippered openings on the lower legs allow easy on/off; adjustable cuffs cinch down securely over boots. Zippered hand pockets feature bonded flaps for protection from moisture.
short_description: The lightweight REI Rainwall rain pants offer the full-featured, waterproof breathable protection that an active kid needs. He can keep them in his pack for sudden changes in the weather.
